snippet: The 2012 Tony Honors for Excellence in the Theater will go to the musical licensing executive Freddie Gershon; the production supervisor Arthur Siccardi; and the Theater Development Fund’s Open Doors arts education program.
abstract: Tony Honors for Excellence in the Theater, annual prize given to individuals and organizations that are not eligible in the established Tony Award categories for Broadway shows, will go to the musical licensing executive Freddie Gershon, the production supervisor Arthur Siccardi and the Theater Development Fund’s Open Doors arts education program.

byline.original: By PATRICK HEALY; Compiled by ADAM W. KEPLER

lead_paragraph: The 2012 Tony Honors for Excellence in the Theater will go to the musical licensing executive Freddie Gershon; the production supervisor Arthur Siccardi; and the Theater Development Fund’s Open Doors arts education program.
